name: iOS 16.7.7 and iPadOS 16.7.7
available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Nick Galloway of Google Project Zero
